products.shortproductdesc: Keep warm in cool conditions with adidas Mens Terrex Fleece Jacket. Soft Polarfleece construction combines with climawarm insulation to trap your bodys heat. Athletic fit and ergonomically placed flatlock seams enhance movement. Drawcord-adjustable hem holds jacket in place. Ventilation pockets add quick-cooling comfort. 100% polyester. Imported. Sizes: M-2XL. Colors: Black, Tech Grey. Size: Large. Color: Tech Grey. Gender: Male. Age Group: Adult. Material: Fleece. Type: Jackets.

products.primarycategory: shoes > mens > outdoor > hiking & trekking > hiking shoes
products.shortproductdesc: Multifunctional low-cut shoe ideal for light hikes. Durable, rich leather upper keeps feet comfortable. Features EVA cushioning, ADIPRENE support and grippy Continental Rubber outsole. Features:. Strong nubuck leathers and synthetics for extra durability and stability. Molded sockliner to enhance comfort and fit. Lightweight EVA midsole for long term cushioning. Continental Rubber for extraordinary grip.
